title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields with automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these text fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields should be displayed as readonly labels instead of input fields. This way, their values can still be selected and copied by the user.
